revised_title: Observations on the Animalcula of Vegetable Infusions and the Indissoluble Salt from Hemp-Seed
tldr: The author, John Ellis, investigates the growth and reproduction of animalcula in vegetable infusions and discovers a new indissoluble salt arising from hemp-seed put into water until it becomes putrid. He also observes the division of some animalcula, which he believes to be a rare occurrence rather than a natural manner of reproduction.
